## CustomTag interface

To implement a custom tag write a class implementing the Tag interface. Then inject the class together with a tag-name into the FormProperties.TagLibrary.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Tag 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [recursive?](./forms42core.customtag.recursive.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ |
